attributes.action: Stop testing tobacco products on animals
attributes.additional_details: It is completely wrong that this is happening. We know the Heath hazards and tobacco is not healthy - in my opinion there is nothing to test. Animals lives being risked for people who choose to put it in their body - test on humans if necessary
attributes.background: Completely stop any form of tobacco testing on any type of animal - especially dogs!!!

rejection.details: The testing of alcohol and tobacco products on animals has been banned in the UK since 1997. The UK Government is not responsible for the arrangements other countries have for the testing of certain products or substances on animals.
